Entries.pamHouseUpgrade: Our little plan worked out well, don't you think? {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PamName}} and {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PennyName}} seem really happy.
Entries.pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous: Our little plan worked out well, don't you think? {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PamName}} and {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PennyName}} seem really happy.
Entries.cc_Begin: Hey! I heard that {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LewisName}} showed you around the Community Center... It'd be great if you could fix that place up. It used to be a really nice building!
Entries.Fri: You've met my son {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SebastianName}}, right? {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SebastianGender}}}} lives downstairs.#$e#{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SebastianGender}}}}'s a little shy, but I'm sure {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SebastianGender}}}}'ll warm up to you if you're nice to {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Him:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SebastianGender}}}}.
Entries.Fri_inlaw_Sebastian: I miss my {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SebastianNickname}}... {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SebastianGender}}}} was always a little misunderstood, but I believed in {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Him:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SebastianGender}}}}.
Entries.Fri4: #$1 RobinSeb#I found an ashtray in {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SebastianName}}'s room, and it smelled really weird. Should I be worried about this?#$e#Sometimes I worry about {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SebastianName}}... {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SebastianGender}}}} doesn't have many friends and doesn't really seem to care about {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Him:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SebastianGender}}}} future very much...#$e#I would talk to {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Him:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SebastianGender}}}} about it but {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SebastianGender}}}} never opens up to me.
Entries.Fri4_inlaw_Sebastian: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SebastianName}} told me {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SebastianGender}}}}'s trying to quit smoking! I'm really proud of {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Him:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SebastianGender}}}}.
Entries.Sun: I hope {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/DemetriusName}} doesn't blow the house up with those science experiments of {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/His:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/DemetriusGender}}}}.#$e#I'm not even sure what {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/DemetriusGender}}}}'s working on. I think it has something to do with plants.
Entries.Sun2: #$1 RobinDem#My {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Husband:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/DemetriusGender}}}} almost set the house on fire last night with {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/His:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/DemetriusGender}}}} science experiment. One of {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/His:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/DemetriusGender}}}} beakers exploded and sent a fireball into the rafters! Thank Yoba I used fire-resistant lacquer when I built the place.$u#$e#Sorry if it smells weird in here, @. It's my {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Husband:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/DemetriusGender}}}}'s bizarre science project...
Entries.fall_Mon: #$1 RobinMaru#{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MaruName}} likes gems. She uses them in her inventions.#$e#So how are you and {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MaruName}} getting along?
Entries.winter_Fri_inlaw_Sebastian: I think the farm life is really healthy for {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SebastianNickname}}.
